Chapter 1. - Earthly Cloud Setup


1.1 - Introduction

earthly-workshop is maintained by earthly.

This page was generated by GitHub Pages.

Earthly Workshop

Prerequisites

  1. Sign in or Sign up for Earthly.
  2. Install Earthly CLI
  3. Install Docker.
  4. Sign up for a Fly.io account.

Topics Covered

  • Earthfile basics
    • The Earthly command
    • Passing arguments
    • Caching dependencies
    • Running tests
    • Building artifacts
    • Building and pushing images
  • Monorepos and composing pipelines
    • Repository layout
    • Calling targets from other directories
    • Copying artifacts between targets
    • Orchestrating a monorepo or complex build
    • Parallelism
    • Running locally
  • Earthly Satellites
    • Creating and managing satellites
    • Using satellites with your local machine
    • Using satellites with Github Actions
  • Deployment & advanced topics
    • Earthly Cloud secrets
    • Building for different platforms
    • User Defined Commands (UDCs)
    • TBD
